full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 249 of 262 1960 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. From your perspective, she was aware of the fact that Jeffrey was paying -- 2 Jeffrey was paying -- 3 A. I think she was, yeah. 4 Q. And did you ever ask Jeffrey Epstein to pay for your daughter's tuition or did he do it of his own accord? 5 6 A. He was very big on education and he just let us know early on that he would do that. 7 8 Q. And so he took an interest in seeing your daughter succeed? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. And he didn't ask anything of you in return? 11 A. Correct. 12 Q. Now, you knew Ghislaine for at least 15 years or so before she was no longer with Mr. Epstein; isn't that right? 13 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And you interacted with her a fair amount; right? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. I think you said on your testimony that she had a great personality; right? 18 19 A. She did. 20 Q. You don't have any ill will toward Ghislaine Maxwell? 21 A. No. 22 Q. And you felt comfortable around her? 23 A. Sure. 24 Q. You, as father of a daughter, felt comfortable having your daughter around her, too; isn't that right? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013527
